response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to both of us. This product, tailored specifically to your needs and interests, is priced at $1,100,000. Given its exceptional worth to you, I believe this offer presents an excellent balance between our respective interests.

Please consider this proposal carefully. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I am here to assist you in making an informed decision.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1100000}
